org.mmbase.datatypes

Class MustBeTrueDataType

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mmbase.core.AbstractDescriptor
      • org.mmbase.datatypes.BasicDataType<Boolean>
        • org.mmbase.datatypes.BooleanDataType
          • org.mmbase.datatypes.MustBeTrueDataType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Comparable<DataType<Boolean>>, Descriptor, DataType<Boolean>, PublicCloneable<AbstractDescriptor>

    public class MustBeTrueDataType
extends BooleanDataType
    A boolean datatype of which the value must be true. The default value can be false though. This makes it possible to make an input checkbox that the user must check. ("I agree").
    Since:
    MMBase-1.9.3
    Version:
    $Id: BooleanDataType.java 35587 2009-06-02 21:57:49Z michiel $
    Author:
    Michiel Meeuwissen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
